headline: Is CDW (CDW) Pricing Look Attractive After A 33% One Year Share Price Slide?
summary: If you are wondering whether CDW's current share price lines up with its underlying value, this article will walk through what the numbers are really saying. CDW recently closed at US$123.13, with returns of 2.9% decline over 7 days, 2.3% decline over 30 days, 7.5% decline year to date, 33.1% decline over 1 year, 37.0% decline over 3 years, and 18.8% decline over 5 years. These moves may have some investors reassessing both risk and opportunity. Recent coverage around CDW has focused on its...
